Uses of Package
org.dellroad.dataskin.ops

Packages that use org.dellroad.dataskin.ops
Package
Description
org.dellroad.dataskin.ops
Operation and its sub-types.
org.dellroad.dataskin.ops.scanner
Scanners for DataSkin annotations.
org.dellroad.dataskin.viewer
Classes relating to DataViewer.
org.dellroad.dataskin.viewer.basic
Basic implementation of classes required by DataViewer.
org.dellroad.dataskin.viewer.display
API for Vaadin application display customization.
org.dellroad.dataskin.viewer.navtree
Classes relating to the DataViewer navigation tree.
  • Classes in org.dellroad.dataskin.ops used by org.dellroad.dataskin.ops
    Class
    Description
    AbstractAction
     
    AbstractOperation
     
    AbstractQuery
     
    Action
    A possibly mutating data access operation.
    InstanceAction
    An action that is configured in the context of a particular target instance.
    InstanceOperation
    An operation that executes in the context of a particular target object.
    InstanceQuery
    A query operation that is configured in the context of a particular target instance.
    Operation
    An operation that can be performed in a DataSkin model.
    Operation.Handle
    An Operation bound to a target object (if necessary) so that it may be executed.
    Operation.Progress
    Captures the state of progress of an Operation.
    Query
    Read-only data access operation that returns a stream of result items.
    StaticAction
    An action that is configured outside of the context of any particular target instance.
    StaticOperation
    An operation that is configured outside of the context of any particular target instance.
    StaticQuery
    A query operation that is configured outside of the context of any particular target instance.
